message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be a valuable asset to you. I'm asking for $12,000 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $9,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $11,000. I believe this product will bring you significant value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
